      static double convertTimeDurationToTick(double duration_UCalendar, java.lang.String calendarUnit)
      Convert duration with calendar unit TO duration in tick.
      static double days_Utick(long duration_Udays)
      This procedure is a temporary shortcut which aims is to be generalized with the longer (2nd) alternative:
      C_timeAndSpaceConverter.days_Utick(age_Uday);
      replaces :
      double oneDay_Utick = C_ConvertTimeAndSpace.convertTimeDurationToTick(1, "day");
      this.age_Utick = (long) Math.round(age_Uday * oneDay_Utick);
      J.Le Fur, 08.2014, rev. 03.2015
      static int getConverterSpaceMatrixIndex(java.lang.String str) 
      static int getConverterTimeMatrixIndex(java.lang.String str)
      Accepts full string name, 1st character name, except for month (mon)

      • convertTimeDurationToTick

        public static double convertTimeDurationToTick(double duration_UCalendar,
                               java.lang.String calendarUnit)
        Convert duration with calendar unit TO duration in tick.
        For example if the duration is 24H, we have :      durationUCalendar : 24
             calendarFieldUnit : "H"
        Parameters:
        duration_UCalendar - int duration :
        calendarUnit - : S, M, H, D, MON, Y (sec, min, hour, day, month or year)
        Returns:
        the number of tick corresponding to that duration

      • days_Utick

        public static double days_Utick(long duration_Udays)
        This procedure is a temporary shortcut which aims is to be generalized with the longer (2nd) alternative:
        C_timeAndSpaceConverter.days_Utick(age_Uday);
        replaces :
        double oneDay_Utick = C_ConvertTimeAndSpace.convertTimeDurationToTick(1, "day");
        this.age_Utick = (long) Math.round(age_Uday * oneDay_Utick);
        J.Le Fur, 08.2014, rev. 03.2015
        See Also:
        for abbreviations

      • getTickUnit_UcalendarField

        public static int getTickUnit_UcalendarField()
        Must be called just by C_Calendar or after C_Calendar instantiation
        Returns:
        the calendar field number (e.g., MILLISECOND -> 5)
        author mboup or realini, rev. JLF 08.2014, 03.2015
